sentences.en: -- But thou wilt see her now with other eyes.
sentences.cn: —— 但现在你要用另一副目光来见她.

sentences.en: " Thou thyself wilt see it, one time or another.
sentences.cn: “ 总有一天,你自己会看到的.

sentences.en: " Thou wilt not reveal his name?
sentences.cn: 反正他逃不出我的手心. ”

sentences.en: " Wilt thou die for very weakness?
sentences.cn: “ 你难道就因为软弱而要死 吗 ?

sentences.en: " Wilt thou go and play, child? "
sentences.cn: “ 你去玩儿好吗, 孩子? ”

sentences.en: " Wilt thou go with us to - night?
sentences.cn: “ 你们今晚愿意同我们一道去 吗 ?

sentences.en: " Wilt thou let me be at peace, if I once tell thee? "
sentences.cn: “ 要是我告诉你,你肯不肯让我安静安静? ”

sentences.en: Do with him as thou wilt!
sentences.cn: 你对他尽管随心所欲好了!
纳齐恩斯基显然变得颓丧起来.

sentences.en: The roses wilted the next day.
sentences.cn: 这些玫瑰花第二天就枯萎了。

sentences.en: Thou wilt be faithful, little Charles?'
sentences.cn: 你会守信用么, 小查尔斯? ’ ”

sentences.en: Thou wilt find, Eternal Traveller, marks of thy footsteps across my songs.
sentences.cn: “永恒的旅客”呀, 你可以在我的歌众找到你的足迹.

sentences.en: Thou wilt love him -- wilt thou not? "
sentences.cn: 你也会爱他的;不是 吗 ? ”
难道你不肯爱他 吗 ?

sentences.en: Wilt thou reject that priceless benefit? "
sentences.cn: 你难道要反对这没本钱的利益 吗 ? ”

sentences.en: Wilt thou tell her this, thou witch - baby? "
sentences.cn: 你把这话告诉她好吗, 你这小妖精? ”

phrases.tran_cn: 枯萎病；萎凋病；镰刀菌萎蔫病

trans.tran_en: if a plant wilts, it bends over because it is too dry or old

trans.tran_cn: （使）凋谢，（使）枯萎，使畏缩，使衰弱
